title: Here’s A Look At What You’ll Learn…

description.title: The FoodBodyLove Summit will teach you WHY
reasons: ...punishing yourself when you skip the gym
...tying your happiness to a specific weight
conclusion: IS taking you further away from where you want to be. Like WAAAAYY further.
The FoodBodyLove Summit is just the course correction you need.
With a navigable road map and an all-star line-up of speakers as your guides, you'll have everything you need to improve your relationship with food, body, and self.
description.subtitle: Summit Topics Include:

topics.title: Psychology
facts: • Train your brain to let go of destructive habits
• The unseen connection between emotions & eating
• Accept yourself at any size or shape

topics.title: Nutrition
facts: • Work with your metabolism, not against it
• Learn the latest scientific research behind intuitive eating
• Find out what’s driving your binges & cravings

topics.title: Self-Compassion
facts: • See your inner critic in a new light
• Identify ways to bring more acceptance into your life
• Skills you can use when shame hits hard

topics.title: Mindfulness
facts: • Reduce anxiety and become more present in your daily life
• Slow down and learn to truly enjoy your meals

topics.title: Energy Healing
facts: • Rid yourself of toxic limiting beliefs
• Find new ways to strengthen your mind body connection
• Discover new energy systems of healing

epilogue: Plus inspiring success stories to keep you motivated!
